mappings.notes: Mautic models Contacts as Lead entities (API shortName: Contacts). Map to Party with role tags applied by the adapter (lead/contact). Custom fields must be placed into an explicit extension container.
Mautic companies are distinct from contacts but still represent parties. Map to Party with role tag org/vendor/customer as policy dictates.
Mautic campaigns map cleanly to canonical Campaign for MVP; publishUp/publishDown and category remain provider extensions.
Mautic assets are downloadable files. Map them to canonical Document (not canonical Asset).
Segments are selection rules and membership snapshots; keep as ExternalObjectRef to avoid canonical bloat.
Email templates and delivery semantics are vendor-specific; keep as ExternalObjectRef for MVP.
